class ECHO_SXF_ElemBucketRegistry : public SXF_ElemBucketRegistry

ECHO_SXF_ElemBucketRegistry(SXF_OStream& out)

Description

The ElemBucketRegistry implements a registry of element buckets common to all element types (entry, exit, align, and others).
